name: QN900B Neo QLED 8K
description: 85'' Class QN900B Samsung Neo QLED 8K Smart TV (2022)

cards.name: See it all on one screen
cards.description: Watch up to two things at once on your TV, including what is on your compatible mobile device

cards.name: Smart Hub
cards.description: Spend less time searching and more time streaming what you enjoy with Samsung Smart Hub. You will find the movies, shows, games, music and more you want mostâ€”organized and at your fingertips

cards.name: Anti-Glare with Ultra Viewing Angle
cards.description: Watch everything you love with nearly no reflections and no distractions. Now your entertainment can look as good in the morning as it does at night with the lights on. Anti-Reflection technology limits light distraction on your screen by reducing the glare

cards.name: Infinity Screen with Slim One Connect
cards.description: The Samsung Neo QLED 8K features the expansive Infinity Screen with a near-invisible bezel and the Attachable Slim One Connect that keeps your cables out of sight
